notificationContent:
Seems like you are using an older app version. 
Do you want to upgrade now for a new version of UpBeat?
dialogDeletePlaylistContent: Are you sure you want to delete “{}”?
dialogDeleteUpNextContent: Are you sure you want to clear “Up Next Queue”?
canNotEnableShuffle: Unable to turn on shuffle mode
urlInvalid: Your URL is not valid or playlists are private
clearHistoryContent: Your search history helps us to show you better results when you search.
createPlaylistContent: Create a playlist of your favourite tracks
createLibraryContent: Add tracks to your library by searching songs, and add them to Upbeat
subscriptionInfo:
- Get unlimited access to all features for {}/3month, {}/year and {}/lifetime 

- The payment will be charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. 

- The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. 

- Subscription may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase. 

- The account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. 

- Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.
searchSongAndAddToPlaylist: Search for songs & add them to your playlist
noInternet:
Slow or no internet connection.
 Please check your internet settings and try again
addSongToUpNext: Add track to Up Next by tapping icon
swipeToDismiss: Swipe Left to Edit or Remove
confirmAddPlaylistContent: Do you want to add {} tracks of playlist {} to your personal playlist?
backupSubTile: Backup your music, transfer your library to other devices, recover deleted music, and more.
backupDes: UpBeat will backup your music automatically to your code, whenever you start or leave the app
restoreMusic:
Enter a backup code to recover music from another device, merge libraries between devices, and more. 

 If your backup code is not working, please try again in a few minutes.
confirmTitle: How would you like to import this backup?
restoreSuccessTitle: The music contained in the backup code has been imported into your library!
backupBefore: You should back up songs before sharing the code with others.
whatDoYouWanToDo: What do you want to do?
backupPremium: Backup, restore and share your playlist
needPremium: You need a premium subscription to use this feature

mayoverheatsub: The video quality you choose is high, so your device needs more processing and can heat up quickly.

enterBackup:
Enter a backup code to recover music from another device, merge libraries between devices, and more. 

If your backup code is not working, try replacing any L's with 1's, and vice versa.
